title: Create a cost type record
content:
1. From the main menu, select Run > Financials > Cost Types.

  2. Click New.

  3. In the New Cost Type dialog box, provide all requested information. This dialog box requests values for the basic attributes.

    Field Description
    Display label External (common) name of the cost type.
    Type Type of cost; capital expenditure (CAPEX) or operating expenditure (OPEX).
    Accounting code Internal code used for accounting.
    Code Internal code for the cost type.
    Description Description that captures the details of the cost type.

  4. Click Save.

    Alternatively, you can click Save & add another to add another cost type record, or click Save & Edit to continue to edit the current cost type record.
